item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Wasn't the December restaurant of the month last year also an Italian place? Anyway, the membership has voted! The December Restaurant of the month is the Colosseum Restaurant.

About the Restaurant of the Month:

An award winning Italian Restaurant located in Salem, NH known for its fine Italian cuisine, excellent service, and elegant atmosphere. Join Annibale Todesca and enjoy exquisite Southern Italian cooking using only the freshest of ingredients.

http://www.thecolosse...
